title: People from Sydney?
body: Hey guys I am going to Sydney for the summer I cant wait, but i wonder how is your ping like for you? Like i heard horror stories that people have above 300 ping on OC server even users play from Australia. So i am wondering is it fixed and how is it now, Thank you!

replies.body: The issue doesn't lie with Riot's servers, but rather with poor routing with ISP's. From what I can tell, the network infrastructure in Australia isn't the best quality and could definitely use some major improvements. All in all, however, you should have a reasonable ping if you're in Australia playing on the Oceania server. If you're playing on the EUW server from Australia, I'd imagine a ping around 180-220, considering you're on a relatively decent network.
It is bullshit. Dont listen to them. My ping is a constant 19

I have a rock solid 7ms ping. 
TPG NBN (fiber 100Mbps/40Mbps)

Earlier I had Wondercom FTTB (VDSL 75Mbps) and had a solid 15-20ms 

I'd say most of the problems come from ISP or too many people sharing same connection.

Well i am in the middle of melbourne with a ping of 19 at most times. Even in country Tasmania i have a ping of 65 so I don't see how there will be any problem in sydney. At high use time you can get ping spiking a lot but then you just have to have a break for a couple hours
